BU mourns loss of three students in New Zealand

Boston University is in mourning after three undergraduates studying in New Zealand died in a car crash and five others were injured. (Globe, 12:29 p.m.)

Mitt Romney told students at Liberty University that marriage is an enduring institution that's reserved for one man and one woman, during his keynote address today at the school's commencement. (AP, 1:10 p.m.)
